summary: REQ-28 and REQ-29 appear to be implemented: ProductCard and ProductImageGallery now try resolving images by product ID first with fallback to product name, and the product image helper returns URL-encoded image src paths to handle spaces in filenames.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional fuzzy/partial matching logic in getProductImages beyond the specified “fallback to productName”.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-28 requests a two-step lookup (by productId, then by productName) when no images are found. The diff also adds a partial/substring match against mapping.productId (normalized.includes(...) or mapping.productId.includes(normalized)), which is not explicitly requested and may cause unintended matches.
